revised_title: Magnetic Observations at Falmouth Observatory for the Year 1894
tldr: This report presents the results of magnetical observations conducted at Falmouth Observatory in 1894. The study focuses on the magnetic declination, inclination, and horizontal force, providing hourly means and solar diurnal ranges of these elements. The observations were made using various instruments, and the data collected will be used to contribute to the International scheme of magnetic observations.
